Uses of Class
com.twilio4j.twiml.Conference

  • Packages that use Conference 
    Package Description
    com.twilio4j.twiml  
    com.twilio4j.twism  

    • Uses of Conference in com.twilio4j.twiml

      Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml that return Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Conference<E> Conference.beep(boolean beep)
      The 'beep' attribute lets you specify whether a notification beep is played to the conference when a participant joins or leaves the conference.
      Conference<E> DeclarativeComposer.conference(java.lang.String roomName)
      Inserts a Conference verb into your TwiML.
      Conference<E> Conference.endConferenceOnExit(boolean endConferenceOnExit)
      If a participant has this attribute set to 'true', then when that participant leaves, the conference ends and all other participants drop out.
      Conference<E> Conference.maxParticipants(int maxParticipants)
      This attribute indicates the maximum number of participants you want to allow within a named conference room.
      Conference<E> Conference.muted(boolean muted)
      The 'muted' attribute lets you specify whether a participant can speak on the conference.
      Conference<E> Conference.startConferenceOnEnter(boolean startConferenceOnEnter)
      This attribute tells a conference to start when this participant joins the conference, if it is not already started.
      Conference<E> Conference.waitMethod(Method waitMethod)
      This attribute indicates which HTTP method to use when requesting 'waitUrl'.
      Conference<E> Conference.waitMethodGET()
      Convenience method that does the same as waitMethod(Method.GET).
      Conference<E> Conference.waitMethodPOST()
      Convenience method that does the same as waitMethod(Method.POST).
      Conference<E> Conference.waitUrl(E waitUrl)
      The 'waitUrl' attribute lets you specify a URL for music that plays before the conference has started.
      Conference<E> Conference.waitUrl(java.lang.String waitUrlString)
      The 'waitUrl' attribute lets you specify a URL for music that plays before the conference has started.
      Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml with parameters of type Conference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Dial.addConference(Conference<E> conference)
      Append a TwiML Conference noun into the Dial verb.
